Virtual reality escape room: Create a virtual reality escape room that simulates a daily task, such as cleaning or cooking. Participants can interact with virtual objects and solve puzzles to progress through the room.

Gamified productivity app: Develop a mobile app that gamifies daily tasks, such as exercise, meditation, or reading. Participants can earn points, badges, or rewards for completing their daily tasks, making the process more engaging and rewarding.

AI-powered personal assistant: Create an AI-powered personal assistant that can automate and optimize daily tasks, such as scheduling appointments, sending reminders, or generating to-do lists. Participants can interact with the personal assistant through voice commands or a user-friendly interface.

Virtual reality fitness classes: Offer virtual reality fitness classes that simulate a variety of workouts, such as yoga, Pilates, or strength training. Participants can interact with virtual instructors and other participants in real-time, making the workout experience more engaging and social.
